A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star wars the last jedi was a visually a buffet for my eyes. The contrast of colors and the special effects won me over. Plot wise the movie was good. A few scenes that I could have gone without because I felt they distracted from the overall plot. Its a shame to see Gwendoline Christie's character (Captain Phasma) so underutilized in terms of her great acting. Overall the movie was amazing and it just gets better after the 3rd time.
